page.title: 18Transport - The Little Chef
page.content: Modern life-styles have seen the growth of many quick-food restaurants. On the A580 is a{Little Chef.}Little Chefs are a popular roadside cafe. They were invented by{Charles Forte}in {1959.}There are over 200 Little Chefs and they are open from 7am. till 10pm.. Most Little Chefs hold parties. The {most popular food}is the {Early {Starter}and{The Chefs Grill.}We found in a survey at our local Little Chef that:- Most people were travelling by {car}from {Liverpool}to a destination within 30 miles. For most people(in the afternoon) the purpose of their journey was {buisness.}Most people had a{meal}and use Little Chefs{regularly. In the doorway there is a telephone and they provide a {Take-Away}service for people in a rush. Little Chefs are the most popular roadside cafes.
